#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(typeof(a) i = a; i<=b; ++i)
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define tr(c,it) for(typeof(c.begin()) it=c.begin();it!=c.end();it++)
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define inf 1000001
/*#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
#define pc(x) putchar_unlocked(x)*/
#define ll long long int
#define ull unsigned long long int
const int SIZE = 1e5+1;

using namespace std;

const long long int mod=1e9+7;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef vector<vi> vvi;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef map<int,int> mii;



/*static inline ll fastio()
{
    ll x=0;
    char c=gc();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
    {
        c=gc();
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    return x;
}

static inline void fastWrite(ll x)
{

  char s[21];
  int i=0;
  do
  {
      s[i++]=x%10+'0';
      x/=10;
  }while(x);
  --i;
  while(i>=0)
  {
      pc(s[i--]);
  }
  pc('\n');

}


int gcd(int x,int y)
{
return(y?gcd(y,x%y):x);
}
int f(int x,int y)
{
    int cnt=0;
    for(int i=x;i<=y;i++)
    {
        if(!(i%x))
            cnt++;
    }
    return cnt;
}*/




ll func(char s[],int len)
{
    ll x=0;
FOR(i,0,len-1){
    x=x*10+s[i]-'0';}
    return x;
}
bool pall(int);
int main()
{
   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
   cin.tie(0);
   vector<int> v1,v2;
   string s;
   cin>>s;
   int l=s.size();
   for(int i=0;i<(l>>1);++i)
    v1.push_back(s[i]-'0');
   for(int i=l>>1;i<l;++i)
    v2.push_back(s[i]-'0');
   ll sum=inner_product(v1.begin(),v1.end(),v2.begin(),0);
   cout<<sum<<endl;
   v1.clear();
   v2.clear();
   return 0;
}
